original_text: Our Christian friends, we want you to know about the trouble that we had in Asia. Those troubles were very painful. We ourselves were not strong enough to continue. We even thought that we would die.
korean_text: 형제들아 우리가 아시아에서 당한 환난을 너희가 모르기를 원하지 아니하노니 힘에 겹도록 심한 고난을 당하여 살 소망까지 끊어지고

sentences.original_text: Our Christian friends, we want you to know
sentences.korean_translation: 우리 그리스도인 친구들이여, 우리는 당신들이 알기를 원합니다

sentences.original_text: about the trouble that we had in Asia
We ourselves were not strong enough to continue
sentences.korean_translation: 우리 자신들은 계속할 만큼 충분히 강하지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: We even thought that we would die
